document.full_text: the obama administration on friday will seek another round of comments on its controversial proposal to require gun dealers in four states on the u.s.-mexico border to report the sale of multiple rifles.
document.title: obama administration seeks more comments on rifle sale plan
lines_and_colors: the obama administration on friday will seek another round of comments on its controversial proposal to require gun dealers in four states on the u.s.-mexico border to report the sale of multiple rifles.
